scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:markup
scripts.build:js: browserify -t riotify -d src/app.js -p [minifyify --compressPath . --map app.js.map --output dist/app.js.map] -o dist/app.js
scripts.COMMENT: TODO: myth should support creating separated map file.
scripts.dev: echo 'open http://localhost:9090' && npm run live-reload & npm run serve & npm run watch:build
